A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would rate this movie 0 stars if I could.  As a lifelong SW fan\, I was beyond disapppointed in this installment.  I actually left the theater wanting my money back.  I didn't like the new characters (Rose and Holdo) at all.  Several side plots were so weak and pointless.  Some of the scenes were so cheesy I almost laughed out loud at their ridiculousness.  Major characters and their backstories were wasted.  Silly humor that wasn't really funny at all.  This movie was such a major blow to my beloved franchise.  I actually hated this movie and am fearful for what will happen in episode 9...don't care really about anyone that I grew to like in episode 7 (Ren\, Poe\, Finn and Rey) as they were ruined by this movie.  I can only hope that Lando will return to save this sinking ship\, but then they'll probably just kill him off too.
